about_the_game:
This is the Demo version of Microvania.  It is a standalone experience, that is set in a separate world from the base game.  It can be completed in a single session, though it may take a little longer to find all the secrets.

Microvania is a tiny metroidvania

So tiny, that the screen resolution is only 160x90!

Explore the depths of Micronus

Traverse and backtrack through meticulously crafted caves, jungles, labs, and more.

Find and make use of classic upgrade tropes

Missiles, Ball-Mode and more!

Full Controller Support

Designed for controllers, with fully configurable buttons.

Microvania respects your time

Don’t worry about saving your progress - the game will create a checkpoint every time you enter a room, and you will spawn back here if you die.

And exiting to the main menu will save that checkpoint to your save file.
